Chapter Forty - Nine

Epilogue

About the Author

Sandi Lynn]197-rebekah m. hallberg about the author sandi lynn is a New York Times , USA Today and [Wall Street Journal]50-wall street journal bestselling author who spends all [her]1829-her days writing . [She]1829-her published [her]1829-her first novel , Forever Black , in February 2013 and has n’t stopped writing since . [Her]1829-her addictions are shopping , going to the gym , romance novels , coffee , chocolate , margaritas , and giving [readers]201-readers an escape to [another world]202-another world .
